gurmukhi: bwrj piRsTxI Awid aucwr ]nwm ky skl ibcwr ]BUruh piRsTx puin pd dIjY ]nwm jwn qupk ko lIjY ]685]
transliteration: Baaraj Pristhaniaadh Ouchaar|| Naam Naal Ke Sakal Bichaar|| Bhooruh Pristhan Poun(i) Pad Deejai|| Naam Jaan Toupak Ko Leejai||685||
translation: Saying the words “Vaarij-Prashthani” in the beginning and thinking of the names of Tupak, and then adding the words “Bhooruha-Prashthani” comprehend the names of Tupak.685.

gurmukhi: BUim Sbd ko Awid aucwro ]ruh piRsTin qum bhur svwro ]nwm qupk ky sB hI hohIN ]jo koaU cqur cIn kr johIN ]686]
transliteration: Bhoom(i) Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Ruh Pristhan(i) Toum Bahur Sadaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Hisabh Hihoheen|| Jo Ko( i)  Chatur Cheen Kar Joheen||686||
translation: Firstly utter the word “Bhoomi” and then add the words “Ruha-Prashthani” and in this way, all the names of Tupak will be formed, which can be recognized by some wise men.686.

gurmukhi: qr ruh piRsTix Awid aucrIAhu ]nwm qupk ky skl ibcwrIAhu ]kwsT kuMdnI Awid bKwno ]nwm qupk ky sB jIA jwno ]687]
transliteration: Tarruh Pristhan(i) Aadh Oucdareeauh|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdareeauh|| Kaasath Koundaniaadh Bakhaano|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Jeea Jaanoh||687||
translation: Saying “Taru-ruhu-Prashthani” in the beginning and thinking of the names of Tupak, then adding the words “Kaashth-Kundani”, comprehend all the names of Tupak in your mind.687.

gurmukhi: BUim Sbd ko Awid aucwrhu ]ruhu su Sbd ko bhur ibcwrhu ]nwm qupk jU ky mwnhu ]Xw mY kCU Byd nhI jwnhu ]688]
transliteration: Bhoom(i) Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaroh|| Roub Su Shabad Ko Bahur Bicdaroh|| Naam Toupak Joo Ke Sabh Maanoh|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahijaanoh||689||
translation: Say firstly the word “Bhoomi” and then add the word “Ruha”, and comprehend in this way all the names of Tupak unhesitatingly.688.

gurmukhi: piRQI Sbd ko piRQmY dIjY ]ruh pd bhur aucwrn kIjY ]nwm qupk ky sB jIA jwno ]Xw mY kCU Byd nhI mwno ]689]
transliteration: Prithishabad Ko Porithmai Deejai|| Ruh Pad Bahur Ouchaaran Keejai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Jeea Jaano|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahimaano||689||
translation: Utter the word “Ruha” after the word “Prathvi” and in this way, without any differeince, know the names of Tupak.689.

gurmukhi: ibrC Sbd ko Awid aucwro ]piRsTx pd kih jIA ibcwro ]nwm qupk ky hoih Apwrw ]Xw mY kCU n Byd inhwrw ]690]
transliteration: Birachh Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Pristhan Pad Kah(i) Jeea Bicdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Hoh(i) Apaaraa|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Na Bhed Nihaaraa||690||
translation: Putting firstly the word “Vraksh” and then adding the word “Prashthani” afterwards, many names of Tupak are formed, there is no mystery in it.690.

gurmukhi: dRumj Sbd ko Awid aucwro ]piRsTx pd kih hIey ibcwro ]sB hI nwm qupk ky hovYN ]jau koaU cqur ic`q mY jovYN ]691]
transliteration: Droumaj Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Pristhan Pad Kah(i) Heee Bicdaro|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Hovain|| Jau Ko( i)  Chatur Chitt Mai Jovain||691||
translation: Putting the word “Drumaj” in the beginning and the word “Prashthani” at the end, all the names of Tupak are formed, if any wise men want to know.691.

gurmukhi: qr pd muK qy Awid aucwro ]piRsTx pd kO bhur ibcwro ]nwm qupk ky sB jIA jwno ]Xw mY kCU Byd nhI mwno ]692]
transliteration: Tar Pad Moukh Te Aadh Oucdaro|| Pristhan(i) Pad Kau Bahur Bicdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Jeea Jaano|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahimaano||692||
translation: Saying the word “Taru” in the beginning and thinking about the word “Prashthani” afterwards, comprehend all the names of Tupak without any discrimination.692.

gurmukhi: ruK Sbd ko Awid aucwro ]piRsTx pd kih bhur ibcwro ]sB hI nwm qupk ky hoeI ]Xw mY khU Byd nhI koeI ]693]
transliteration: Roukh Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Pristhan Pad Kah(i) Bahur Bicdaro|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Hoee|| Yaa Mai Kahoo Bhed Nahikoee||693||
translation: Putting the word “Rukh” in the beginning and the word “Prashthani” afterwards, all the names of Tupak are formed without any difference.693.

gurmukhi: auqBuj pd ko Awid aucwro ]piRsTx pd kih hIey ibcwro ]sB hI nwm qupk ky jwno ]Xw mY khU Byd nhI mwno ]694]
transliteration: Outbhuj Pad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Pristhan Pad Kah(i) Heee Bicdaro|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Jaano|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahimaano||694||
translation: Saying the word “Utbhuj” in the beginning and thinking about the word “Prashthani” in the mind, comprehend all the names of Tupak without any difference.694.

gurmukhi: qru su Sbdu ko Awid aucwro ]bhur piRsTxI Sbd ibcwro ]sB hI nwm qupk ky jwno ]Xw mY kCU Byd n pCwno ]695]
transliteration: Tar(u) Su Shabad(u) Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Bahur Pristhanishabad Bicdaro|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Jaano|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Na Pachhaado||695||
translation: Saying the word “Tarsu” in the beginning and then adding the word “Prashthani”, comprehend the names of Tupak without any difference.695.

gurmukhi: p`qRI pd ko Awid bKwno ]piRsTx Sbd su bhur pRmwno ]sB hI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]Xw mY kCU Byd nhI mwnhu ]696]
transliteration: Pattripad Ko Aadh Bakhaano|| Pristhan Shabad Su Bahur Pramaano|| Sabh Hinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahimaanoh||696||
translation: Comprehend all the names of Tupak by putting the word “Patri” in the beginning and then adding the word “Prashthani” afterwards, and do not consider any mystery in it.696.
